statements: SELECT * FROM voice_assistant_commands LIMIT 5;
SELECT command_name, device_type FROM voice_assistant_commands WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_id, command_name FROM voice_assistant_commands WHERE command_type = 'voice';
SELECT * FROM voice_assistant_commands WHERE device_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY device_type, command_id DESC;
SELECT device_type, COUNT(*) AS total_commands FROM voice_assistant_commands GROUP BY device_type HAVING total_commands > 2;
SELECT * FROM voice_assistant_commands ORDER BY command_name DESC, device_type ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT command_name, device_type FROM voice_assistant_commands WHERE device_id = 2 AND command_type = 'voice';
SELECT command_name, device_type FROM voice_assistant_commands WHERE device_type = 'speaker' ORDER BY command_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM voice_assistant_commands WHERE command_id IN (1, 3, 5, 8);
SELECT DISTINCT device_id, device_type FROM voice_assistant_commands WHERE command_type = 'gesture';
SELECT * FROM smart_devices
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM smart_devices WHERE room_id = 1
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM smart_devices ORDER BY device_type ASC
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM smart_devices WHERE device_type = 'Smart Bulb'
SELECT command_name, command_description FROM voice_commands ORDER BY command_name DESC
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM smart_devices WHERE room_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM smart_devices WHERE device_type = 'smart speaker';
SELECT command_name, command_description FROM voice_commands WHERE device_id = 2;
SELECT device_name, device_type, room_id FROM smart_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT smart_devices.device_name, voice_commands.command_name FROM smart_devices JOIN voice_commands ON smart_devices.device_id = voice_commands.device_id;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT device_name FROM SmartHomeDevices WHERE room_id = 2;
SELECT command_text FROM VoiceAssistantCommands WHERE device_id = 3;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM Users ORDER BY user_name DESC;

SELECT command_text, device_name, user_name FROM VoiceAssistantCommands JOIN SmartHomeDevices ON VoiceAssistantCommands.device_id = SmartHomeDevices.device_id JOIN Users ON VoiceAssistantCommands.user_id = Users.user_id;
SELECT * FROM VoiceAssistantCommands WHERE device_id = 3;
SELECT user_name, COUNT(*) AS total_commands FROM VoiceAssistantCommands JOIN Users ON VoiceAssistantCommands.user_id = Users.user_id GROUP BY user_name;
SELECT device_name, COUNT(*) AS total_commands FROM VoiceAssistantCommands JOIN SmartHomeDevices ON VoiceAssistantCommands.device_id = SmartHomeDevices.device_id GROUP BY device_name;
SELECT command_text, device_name, room_id FROM VoiceAssistantCommands JOIN SmartHomeDevices ON VoiceAssistantCommands.device_id = SmartHomeDevices.device_id;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type, status FROM smart_home_devices WHERE room_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, status FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type = 'light' ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_devices FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT room_name, room_location FROM rooms WHERE room_location = 'Living Room';
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type = 'light' ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_name, room_id FROM smart_home_devices WHERE status = 'ON' AND room_id = 3;
SELECT command_string, execution_time FROM voice_commands WHERE executed_by_user = 'Alice' ORDER BY execution_time DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT device_name, room_name FROM smart_home_devices JOIN rooms ON smart_home_devices.room_id = rooms.room_id WHERE status = 'OFF';
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type, is_active FROM smart_home_devices WHERE room_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM smart_home_devices WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT device_name, room_name, location FROM smart_home_devices JOIN rooms ON smart_home_devices.room_id = rooms.room_id;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'JohnDoe';
SELECT device_name, device_type, room_id FROM smart_home_devices WHERE is_active = true;

SELECT u.username, d.device_name, r.room_name FROM users u JOIN user_devices ud ON u.user_id = ud.user_id JOIN smart_home_devices d ON ud.device_id = d.device_id JOIN rooms r ON d.room_id = r.room_id;

SELECT u.username, d.device_name, v.command_text FROM users u JOIN user_devices ud ON u.user_id = ud.user_id JOIN smart_home_devices d ON ud.device_id = d.device_id JOIN voice_commands v ON d.device_id = v.device_id;
SELECT d.device_name, v.action_text FROM smart_home_devices d JOIN voice_commands v ON d.device_id = v.device_id WHERE v.command_text = 'Turn on lights';
